scripts.dev: npm run package:dev && npm run run:bundled
scripts.stop:backend: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$p = Get-Process desktop -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($p) { $p | Stop-Process -Force }; exit 0"
scripts.build:backend: npm run stop:backend && cargo clean -p desktop && cargo build -p desktop --bin desktop
scripts.package:dev: npm run build:backend && npm run build && npm run stage:dev
